Koga Shuko:

::Koga Shuko slowly awoke, undoing the straps around himself::
"Who was piloting his?!"

::A Predacon stood:: "Me sir."
::The Predacon fell as three laser bolts tore through his face, Koga Shuko 
mumbling about stupidity::
<All forces, this is Koga Shuko, prepare for an attack.  Unitron, report to 
the bridge, immeadiately>
::Shuko looked to Set::
"Wasting our ammuniton..."
